categories: Category:Cut content from Battle of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: Darth Nix was a female humanoid Sith Lord with yellow eyes, black hair, and light blue body markings. She wielded a pink-bladed lightsaber.

Darth Nix was a proposed character for the video game Battle of the Sith Lords, which was being developed by Red Fly Studio around 2011. Concept art for the character was published by artist Thomas A. Szakolczay on his ArtStation profile.
